Hi Ken,

	Sorry to have taken so much of your time.

	But you can imagine it was a bit disturbing to be working on what I 
thought was wholly my work

Hi Ken,

	Sorry to have taken so much of your time.

	But you can imagine it was a bit disturbing to be working on what I 
thought was wholly my work (acknowledging the contributions from 
everybody here) and suddenly realize that it might be covered by your patent.

	Not that I ever _believed_ you would have allowed it to become too 
widely scoped, but paranoia is a terrible thing.

	Anyway, I'm quite happy now, and after lunch will get back to asking 
the technical stuff...

	I owe you an apology and a beer/chocolate cake/pizza (*delete as 
applicable) if we ever actually meet.

	Ian


In fifteen minutes, everybody will be in the future.
